 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַ֫יִן‎</span> **proper name** 

**1. of a people** (see [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>G i. 151 f.</sup> [[BDB#Mey|Mey]]<sup>Entstehung 115</sup>; compare Arabic proper name, of family <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Nabataean, Sinaitic proper name, masculine and feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קינו‎</span>; tribe of ***smiths?***); — tribe of Mose's father-in-law [[Judg.4.11|Judg 4:11]] (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֵינִי‎</span> [[Judg.1.16|Judg 1:16]]), <span class="bdbLangGreek">Καινα</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup> <span class="bdbLangGreek">Κειν</span>; akin to Midian ([[Num.10.29|Num 10:29]] [[BDB#P|P]]), settled among Amalekites in south of Canaan (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֵינִי‎</span>); prophesied against by Balaam [[Num.24.22|Num 24:22]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָ֑יִן‎</span>; [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]); — see also  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֵינִי‎</span> 

**2. location** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַקַּ֫יִן‎</span> in southern Judah (a settlement of II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> **1** ?); — [[Josh.15.57|Josh 15:57]], <span class="bdbLangGreek">[Ζακαν]αειμ</span>, [[BDB#A|A]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">[Ζανω] Ακειμ</span>, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup> [<span class="bdbLangGreek">Ζανου</span>] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ακεν</span>; possibly= <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***Yª†în***</u></abbr> southeast from Hebron [[[BDB#Rob|Rob]]<sup>BR ii.85</sup>] (see [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Geogr. 162 f.</sup> who, however, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִינָה‎</span> v[[Josh.15.22|Josh 15:22]]). 



 III. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַ֫יִן‎</span> **proper name, masculine** ==Cain, Kain== eldest son of Adam and Eve (explanation [[Gen.4.1|Gen 4:1]] from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָנָה‎</span> ***acquire***; but in fact = II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span>, as ***heros eponymos***, according to [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>compare11</sup> [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>G 285 ff.</sup> [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]<sup>Urg. 193</sup> [[BDB#Holz|Holz]]<sup>[[Gen.50|Gen 50]]f.</sup> especially [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>ZAW xiv (1894), 250 ff.</sup>; xv (1895), 157 ff., [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Ency.Bib.CAIN</sup>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Gen.4.1|Gen 4:1]]; [[Gen.4.2|Gen 4:2]]; [[Gen.4.3|Gen 4:3]]; [[Gen.4.5|Gen 4:5]] (twice in verse); [[Gen.4.8|Gen 4:8]] (twice in verse); [[Gen.4.9|Gen 4:9]]; [[Gen.4.13|Gen 4:13]]; [[Gen.4.15|Gen 4:15]] (twice in verse); [[Gen.4.16|Gen 4:16]]; [[Gen.4.17|Gen 4:17]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָ֑יִן‎</span> v[[Gen.4.6|Gen 4:6]] v[[Gen.4.24|Gen 4:24]] v[[Gen.4.25|Gen 4:25]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]).
